channel.title: Large Carnivores on
channel.description: Recent content in Large Carnivores on

item.title: New PhD student on large carnivore monitoring
item.description: I’m so delighted to announce that Julie will start a PhD in October with me, jointly working with Eric Marboutin and Christophe Duchamp from ONCFS. There will be also collaborations with John Linnell from NINA. She’ll be studying the various ways to assess the distribution of large carnivores and methods to optimise the associated monitoring protocols.
